QuestData.Title: A Little Help From My Friends
QuestData.Description: Ugh... It's so hot...$B$BI was exploring this area, when all of a sudden, the heat just became unbearable. I must be suffering from heat exhaustion.$B$BPlease, help me get back to my friend Spraggle at Marshal's Stand. I think I'm well enough to follow you there.$B$BI am feeling a little out of it, so you can slap me if I'm feeling woozy. If I do happen to faint again, just splash some water on me from Spraggle's canteen. That should work, I hope...
QuestData.LogDescription: Lead Ringo to Spraggle Frock at Marshal's Stand.$B$BIf Ringo feels weak, slap him. If he faints, use Spraggle's Canteen to revive him.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Return to Spraggle Frock at Marshal's Stand.
QuestData.RewardText: Ringo's not in the best shape, $n, but I am glad to have him back in one piece!$B$BThank you for finding him.
